wordGroup: odor control 臭气控制，气味控制；四氟化硅处理

sentences.en: That odor tickled my hunger and I followed it.
sentences.cn: 那种气味勾起了我的饥饿感，我就跟着它走。

sentences.en: Suddenly, a large Dog, attracted by the odor of the boiling oil, came running into the cave.
sentences.cn: 突然，一只大狗被煮沸的油的气味吸引过来，跑进了山洞。

sentences.en: Smell stimuli form what Shepherd terms "odor objects", stored as memories, and these have a direct link with our emotions.
sentences.cn: 气味刺激形成了谢泼德所称的“气味物体”，并以记忆的形式储存起来，这些气味与我们的情感有着直接的联系。
